review.title: “Handling Complete Plant operations i.e. production handling, quality control,dispatch handling”
review.pros: Pros – Here i learn complete operations to running a plant i.e. production, supply chain management, quality control, timely dispatch of material.
review.cons: Cons – It is situated at a place where some of the basic requirement i.e. electricity is not good which is very essential.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
